job.title: UI Software Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li>Contribute to flagship products as part of a creative cross-functional team</li><li>Work closely together with design team and UI/UX experts and leverage design as code concept.</li><li>Building automated frameworks for safe production deployments which can easily be maintained and operated by SRE's</li><li>Always learn and bring new concepts and technology to your team<br></li></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul><li>Work experience in some of the following areas: Javascript, Typescript, Python, Rest APIs, React, Angular, </li><li>Produce front-end code and visual components to create a polished and highly functional user interface with a focus on usability and simplicity of design</li><li>Eager to learn enough about whatever tools or tricks are needed to make things work</li><li>Cares about readable, performant, reliable, and secure code</li><li>UI developer that designs, develops, tests, reviews code, documents and deploys</li><li>3+ years of experience<br></li></ul><strong><u>Your Key Interests<br></u></strong><ul><li>Mobile development, using cross platform UI design and code</li><li>Following latest trends on UI technologies, and UI development processes</li><li>Automated testing of UI functionality</li><li>Cloud environments such as AWS, Google Cloud Platform and Azure</li></ul>
